product_name: ROLA Adventure System Hitch Mount Cargo Carrier with Tilt Assembly
long_description: The ROLA Adventure System Hitch Mount Cargo Carrier with Tilt Assembly is a great alternative to a roof box, offering a low load level for easy access to gear. The Adventure System Hitch Mount Cargo Carrier with Tilt Assembly attaches to your hitch, and it features a sturdy flat cargo tray and an included cargo box. Cargo tray features fully functioning taillights; cargo tray offers 49 x 21 in. of usable surface space to stack gear. Cargo box offers 13.5 cu. ft. of weather-resistant storage, and it securely sits on cargo tray. Tilt design lets you lower the cargo tray and box out of the way to reach the rear of the vehicle. Includes keyed locks. Fits 2 in. hitches. Maximum capacity: 250 lbs.
